data.event: The county was formed in 1779 from the eastern part of Tryon County.

event.title: 1782 the southeastern part of Burke County was annexed

data.event: In 1782 the southeastern part of Burke County was annexed to Lincoln County.

event.title: 1841 parts of Lincoln County and Rutherford County were combined

data.event: In 1841 parts of Lincoln County and Rutherford County were combined to form Cleveland County.

event.title: 1842 the northern third of Lincoln County became

data.event: In 1842 the northern third of Lincoln County became Catawba County.

event.title: 1846 the southern half of what was left

data.event: In 1846 the southern half of what was left of Lincoln County became Gaston County.
